pages.text: When one needs to strip an item of its magical properties, the $(thing)Disenchanting Table$() is perfect. With the keen energy of moonstones to wipe away magic, this table can accurately remove any individual aura present and store it in a book... $(o)to a point$(). Surround with pillars of crystal to further enhance its abilities.

pages.name: Disenchanting Setup
pages.text: Displayed is the maximum setup for the disenchanting table. Fewer pillars yield less power.

Alone, the disenchanting table can remove up to one enchantment from any item and return an enchanted book. Enchantment removals are item-specific, so different tables won't stack. $(br2)Every two pillars added adds one more disenchant per item.$(br2)Any kind of enchantment can be stripped from an item, $(l)including augments$()
